scripts.build: apt-get update && apt-get install -y php-cli php-curl php-mbstring php-xml unzip curl && curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php && mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache
